attributes.action: Gareth Southgate to be Knighted if England win the World Cup
attributes.background: Regardless if England win the World Cup, Gareth Southgate should be Knighted. Seeing as after 28 years England have never got into the Semi Finals.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
